feed.title: Howe Sound - Marine Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: Forecast for Today Tonight and Wednesday. - Howe Sound
entry.summary:
Wind northerly outflow 15 knots becoming southerly inflow 10 to 20 this afternoon then diminishing to light this evening. Wind increasing to northerly outflow 10 to 20 near midnight then diminishing to light Wednesday morning. Wind becoming southerly inflow 5 to 15 Wednesday afternoon. Chance of showers beginning early this afternoon changing to rain this evening then to chance of showers Wednesday afternoon and evening.
Issued 10:30 AM PDT 12 June 2018

entry.title: Extended Forecast - Howe Sound
entry.summary:
Thursday: Wind light increasing to southerly inflow 15 to 25 knots in the afternoon.
Friday: Wind northerly outflow 5 to 15 knots becoming southerly inflow 10 to 20.
Saturday: Wind northerly outflow 10 to 20 knots becoming southerly inflow 10 to 20.
Issued 04:00 AM PDT 12 June 2018
